layman_description: System for customizing which icons appear in your UI and menus.
technical_description: Configuration system managing icon display and visibility in menu hierarchy.
player_impact: Customize your HUD and menus to show only the information you care about.

layman_description: Economic value of items for selling to vendors.
technical_description: Item value property determining currency reward when trading with NPCs.
player_impact: Know how much each item is worth before selling to merchants.

layman_description: Visual icons showing injuries, diseases, and buffs affecting your character.
technical_description: Health and status indicator icons displayed in player HUD and inventory menu.
player_impact: Monitor your character's condition and active effects at a glance.

layman_description: Quick-access slots for tools like torches, flashlights, and repair items.
technical_description: Secondary inventory system for frequently-used tool items with quick equip functionality.
player_impact: Keep essential tools instantly accessible without opening full inventory.

layman_description: Interface for attaching scopes, silencers, and other weapon mods.
technical_description: UI system managing weapon modification attachment and configuration.
player_impact: Customize guns with attachments and parts for better combat performance.

layman_description: Quick access to items you recently picked up or used.
technical_description: Inventory filter showing recently accessed or acquired items in order.
player_impact: Find items you just looted without scrolling through entire inventory.

layman_description: Icons showing what materials are needed to craft an item.
technical_description: Visual indicators for missing or available crafting ingredients.
player_impact: Instantly see if you have the materials needed to craft something.

layman_description: Dedicated storage for first aid supplies, bandages, and medicine.
technical_description: Health item category organized in inventory with quick-access binding.
player_impact: Keep healing items easily accessible for emergency medical care.

layman_description: Sell all items of selected type to merchant at once.
technical_description: Function for bulk transaction of item categories to vendor NPCs.
player_impact: Sell massive stacks of loot faster than trading one item at a time.

layman_description: Detailed text explaining what an item does and how to use it.
technical_description: Item property containing localized description text displayed in tooltips.
player_impact: Learn what mysterious items do and when to use them.

layman_description: Icon showing skills or perks you've unlocked for better gear.
technical_description: Progression indicator icon showing unlocked crafting and equipment tiers.
player_impact: See which gear you've earned access to through skill progression.

layman_description: Collection of broken items available to be scrapped into components.
technical_description: Container filter showing disassemblable items for salvage and scrapping.
player_impact: Find broken gear to recycle into useful crafting materials.

layman_description: Configure which items appear in your quick-access hotbar.
technical_description: UI system for assigning items to numbered hotkey slots (1-9).
player_impact: Put your most-used items where you can grab them instantly.

layman_description: Prevent accidentally selling or dropping your favorite items.
technical_description: Toggle system protecting specific inventory items from being moved or traded.
player_impact: Protect special weapons and gear from accidental loss during looting.

layman_description: Timer showing how long consumable effects like food or medicine last.
technical_description: Visual countdown indicator for temporary item effects and buff duration.
player_impact: Know when your food buff expires and hunger returns.

layman_description: Separate stack for organizing different ammo types in inventory.
technical_description: Inventory item grouping system automatically organizing ammunition by caliber.
player_impact: Keep ammo organized by type instead of mixing all bullets together.

layman_description: Activate consumable items like food or medical supplies instantly.
technical_description: Action button for consuming food, medicine, and temporary buff items.
player_impact: Eat food or use medicine with one click from inventory without closing menu.

layman_description: Color code indicating how common or rare an item is.
technical_description: Rarity enum property mapped to color values for visual categorization.
player_impact: Instantly spot legendary drops in piles of common loot.

layman_description: Badge showing item quality crafted by you (poor/normal/excellent).
technical_description: Quality tier indicator for player-crafted items based on skill and perks.
player_impact: See how well you crafted somethingâ€”better crafted items perform better.

layman_description: Dedicated slots for carrying traps and explosives safely.
technical_description: Inventory container for explosive and trap items with safety separation.
player_impact: Keep grenades and traps easily accessible for base defense.

layman_description: Estimates how much a vendor will pay for items before selling.
technical_description: Calculation system showing estimated trade value before confirming sale.
player_impact: Negotiate better deals by knowing your items' fair market value.

layman_description: Alerts when you pick up rare items or reach weight limit.
technical_description: UI notification system for inventory events like full capacity or loot alerts.
player_impact: Get warned before you're over-encumbered or when you find good loot.

layman_description: Shows skill requirements needed to use advanced weapons or gear.
technical_description: Indicator displaying minimum skill level required for equipment effectiveness.
player_impact: Know if you're skilled enough to use found weapons effectively.

layman_description: Dedicated section for keeping food organized separately from supplies.
technical_description: Inventory category filter for perishable food items and consumables.
player_impact: Find food quickly when you're starving in the middle of combat.

layman_description: Save and swap between multiple equipment configurations instantly.
technical_description: Inventory preset system allowing saved equipment loadouts for quick switching.
player_impact: Switch from combat to stealth gear with one button press.

layman_description: Mounting point on weapons where you can attach mods and accessories.
technical_description: Weapon hardpoint system defining compatible modular attachments.
player_impact: Customize weapons with scopes, silencers, and better components.

layman_description: Warning icon showing food is getting old and will expire soon.
technical_description: Spoilage timer indicator for perishable food items approaching expiration.
player_impact: Eat perishable food before it spoils and wastes valuable calories.

layman_description: Large storage accessible from vehicles like trucks and minibikes.
technical_description: Extended inventory container accessible from mounted vehicle storage.
player_impact: Store loot while exploring in vehicles and retrieve it later.

layman_description: Detailed stats for armor pieces showing protection and penalties.
technical_description: UI panel displaying armor attributes including coverage, protection values, and movement penalties.
player_impact: Understand armor trade-offs like protection versus mobility.

layman_description: Automatically arrange items into logical categories and positions.
technical_description: Sorting algorithm that organizes inventory by type, rarity, and usage frequency.
player_impact: Keep inventory automatically organized as you loot and move items.

layman_description: Badge showing your relationship level with different merchant NPCs.
technical_description: Reputation indicator icon representing standing with trader entities.
player_impact: See which traders like you and offer better prices.
